name: Capture the Pearl
description: A new team PvP gamemode for Rain Meadow! Coordinate with your team to steal the other team's pearl and run it back to your home shelter to score!<LINE><LINE>Features:<LINE>* Play in ANY region!<LINE>* Play with up to 4 teams (although 2 is recommended).<LINE>* Configurable creature spawns and game length.<LINE>* Players and pearls have clearly colorized indicators and are shown on the map.<LINE>* Chat is automatically hidden from other teams. Start your messages with + to send them to everyone.<LINE>* You can always kill players on other teams. Friendly Fire only applies to teammates.<LINE>* Players are slightly slowed when carrying pearls (configurable in the remix menu).<LINE>* A lot more; I'm too tired to write this.<LINE><LINE>WATCHER COMPATIBILITY! You can now play in most Watcher regions. Sunlit Port is especially a fun one to try, since it's very small and simple to navigate.
